content: this pattern makes a beautiful reversible lace scarf that can be knitted in different yarns an opportunity to use that fingering weight wool soft alpaca perhaps some of your sock yarn or sport weight yarn for pattern in danish 1 visit http //herligehverdage blogspot com/2008/09/oversat-mnster html in french http //legarsquitricote com/ p=2271 1 http //herligehverdage blogspot com/2008/09/oversat-mnster html
